attributes.additional_details: Lockdown has had a big effect on children all over the UK. Parents are still expected to work, how can that be made possible when we have children at home to look after?. My son is very behind for his age because of the lockdown, and I have seen so much progress since starting back in September. I cannot teach my children at home, what a teacher can teach them in a school environment. There are people working essential jobs all over the country. Teaching is an essential job.
attributes.background: Keep schools open during the lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
